### Request for Proposal: Refurbishment and Certification for Hydrostatic Testing of Helium Tube Trailer

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Title:** Refurbishment and 10-year Certification for Hydrostatic Testing of 38 Tubes on Helium Tube Trailer
* **Contract Number:** cb-174-22766315
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** 5000078038
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-21T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-10
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-01-31

**Request Summary**

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to refurbish and procure 10-year certification for hydrostatic testing of 38 tubes on a helium tube trailer. The successful supplier will be responsible for the refurbishment, testing, and certification of the tubes to ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

**Location**

The trailer will be picked up at the Carvel Radar site in Alberta (53.56056°N 114.14495°W) prior to certification.

**Requirements**

* Services will be subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.
* Interested suppliers must submit their proposal in a sealed envelope to the Contracting Officer, Caitlin Andersen, at 867 Lakeshore Road, Burlington, ON L7S1A1.
* Bidders owned or led by Canadians from under-represented groups are encouraged to submit a bid.

**Additional Information**

For more information, please contact the Contracting Officer at (289) 812-9507 or Caitlin.Andersen@ec.gc.ca. Please consult the Part 2 – Bidder Instructions and Part 3 – Terms and Conditions for more details.
